JobFullDesc: Our Strategic Response Team is seeking an experienced and agile Strategic Response leader to support its work in regions where we face complex safety and security issues and where critical elections are being held. The Strategic Response leader will combine a passion for technology’s potential to create opportunity and to make the world more open and connected, with a deep knowledge of Facebook’s integrity and safety product, operations and policy work to ensure our products are facilitating peaceful societies and elections. They will have leadership skills to manage a team of people and influence teams’ strategy across the company.As the reach and impact of the Facebook family of companies continues to grow, so does the responsibility we have to protect the safety, security and human rights of the members of our diverse global community and the civic events that occur across the world.We are looking for candidates who have demonstrated experience communicating and partnering at all levels of an organization, and experience working with Policy, Legal, Communications, Product, and Operations teams. They will be comfortable engaging with leaders within the company and will have leadership skills to manage a team of people and influence teams’ strategy across the company. They will have a clear understanding of the challenges Facebook is facing across the world, and ambitious and creative ideas about how to address them through strong collaboration with cross functional teams.The Strategic Response leader's role will be responsible for managing a team of regional program managers focused on elections and other safety issues in priority countries. They will be responsible for developing frameworks and risk assessments for key events in the region and will ensure that partner teams are delivering while simultaneously planning short-term and
